skill.name: behaviors.skills.CommitSuicideAttack
skill.description: To commit a suicide attack on a given target agent, using the 'launchProjectile' skill. the agent will follow the target agent (a non-teammate, a teammate or a crowd) and launch the choosen projectile on it. This skill make the agent commit suicide, using the "commitSuicide" on itself.

parameter.name: targetAgent
parameter.description: The target to launch projectile on.

parameter.name: quantity
parameter.description: The quantity of resourse to use per time unit.

parameter.name: dotationType
parameter.description: The type of projectile (resource dotation type) to launch to hit the target.

link.name: launchProjectile
link.description: To launch a projectile on the target agent.

feedback.name: done
feedback.description: Sent once the agent has reached the target unit, and makes itself exploded.

feedback.name: failed
feedback.description: Sent if the agent cannot use the specified dotation to perform the attack.
